Package DBAccess

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
DBAccess.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Thoai Tran
This is the Database Appointments access Class. This Class retrieves all the appointment data from the SQL DB

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
      This is the Get All Appointments Method. This method retrieves all the appointment records from the SQL DB Start and End Times are converted from UTC to Current Local Time.
      Returns:
      appointmentsList

    • getAllAppointmentsByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointmentsByMonth()
      This is the Get All Appointments By Month Method. This method retrieves all the appointment records for the CURRENT month from the SQL DB Start and End Times are converted from UTC to Current Local Time.
      Returns:
      appointmentsByMonthList

    • getAllAppointmentsByWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointmentsByWeek()
      This is the Get All Appointments By Week Method. This method retrieves all the appointment records for the CURRENT Week from the SQL DB Start and End Times are converted from UTC to Current Local Time.
      Returns:
      appointmentsByWeekList
